media.caption: Ozcode is disrupting the log-based paradigms for live debugging. By automatically capturing exceptions and enabling dynamic logging with tracepoints, Ozcode puts live data into developersâ€™ hands, enabling time-travel debugging to unleash productivity and cut incident resolution time by up to 80%.
Exceptions are captured automatically and displayed in your dashboard. Autonomous exception capture means you never have to reproduce a production error again.

Full-fidelity time-travel debug data provides unprecedented code-level observability into production errors. View locals, variables, method parameters and return values, network requests, database queries, relevant logs, and more across the call stack for the complete execution flow of errors.
Use tracepoints to add dynamic logs on-the-fly without rebuilding or redeploying your application. Tracepoints can be conditional and provide full time-travel debug information across the call stack.
Pipe dynamic log output to Datadog Log Management for analysis. Click on a dynamic log entry in Datadog to link back to the tracepoint that generated it in Ozcode.

Maintain compliance with privacy regulations using PII redaction. Redacted data never leaves the production environment and can be granularly controlled using regular expressions, identifiers, classes, and namespaces.
Redacted data never leaves the live environment and is masked when debugging.
